errors.error_description: The installation instructions unnecessarily ask to install `py-jwt` separately. `PyJWT` is a core dependency of `strawberry-django-auth` and is installed automatically. Furthermore, `py-jwt` is an incorrect package name.
correction_candidates: Change `pip install py-jwt` to `pip install PyJWT`.
Combine the commands into `pip install strawberry-django-auth PyJWT`.
Change the installation command to `pip install strawberry-django-auth[jwt]`.

errors.error_description: The link to the `CONTRIBUTING.md` file points to an incorrect path within the repository, resulting in a 404 error.
correction_candidates: Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to point to the root of the repository: `.../blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md`
Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to be a relative path: `CONTRIBUTING.md`
Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to point to `.../blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md`
Move the `CONTRIBUTING.md` file into the `/docs` directory.
errors.golden_answer: Change the link to `CONTRIBUTING.md` to point to the root of the repository: `.../blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md`
